steps: Click 'Load Tags' to fetch tags from Chatwoot
Associate each Chatwoot tag with a system category
Contacts from conversations with these tags will be imported

steps: Click 'Load Leads' to fetch leads from Perfex CRM
Use filters to find specific leads
Select leads you want to import
Choose a category and click 'Import Contacts'

config.title: Configure Automatic Backup
config.retentionHint: Older backups will be automatically deleted

restore.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Restore Backup
restore.warningText: This action will restore the ENTIRE system to the selected backup state. All current data (database and files) will be REPLACED.

upload.title: üì§ Restore from File
useForPoints: Restore backup on a new server
upload.warningText: The uploaded backup will replace ALL current system data!
processSteps: File will be uploaded to server
System will be restored to backup state

messages.restoreSuccess: Backup restored successfully! Restarting system recommended.
messages.uploadSuccess: Backup uploaded successfully! Wait for restore...
messages.uploadRestoreSuccess: System restored successfully! Recommend restarting services.
messages.invalidFile: File must be a valid backup (.tar.gz)
messages.confirmRestore:
‚ö†Ô∏è ATTENTION: This action will restore the ENTIRE system to the selected backup state. All current data will be replaced. This action is IRREVERSIBLE. 

Do you want to continue?
messages.confirmUpload:
‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL ATTENTION: This action will:

1. Upload the backup file
2. COMPLETELY REPLACE the current database
3. COMPLETELY REPLACE all files
4. DELETE all current data

This action is IRREVERSIBLE and CANNOT BE UNDONE!

Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to continue?
